sentences.sentence: She tried unsuccessfully to twist free.
sentences.translation: 她试图挣脱身子，但无济于事。

sentences.sentence: She stood unsuccessfully as a candidate in the local elections.
sentences.translation: 她参加了地方选举，但未能当选。

sentences.sentence: He has been trying unsuccessfully to sell the business in one piece since early last year.
sentences.translation: 自去年年初起，他一直没法成功地把整个企业一起卖掉。
